articles.title: ‘Don’s best friend’: How Epstein and Trump bonded over the pursuit of women
articles.description:
For nearly a quarter-century, Mr. Trump and his representatives have offered shifting, often contradictory accounts of his relationship with Mr. Epstein.

The post ‘Don’s best friend’: How Epstein and Trump bonded over the pursuit of women appeared first on Boston.com.
